title: Factory Payrolls, Tobacco Manufactures for United States
notes:
Series Is Presented Here As Two Variables--(1)--Original Data, 1919-1942 (2)--Original Data, 1947-1954. Source: Data Have Been Derived By Multiplying Employment With Average Weekly Earnings, See Bureau Of Labor Statistics, Employment, Hours, And Earnings, Manufacturing Division, Nondurable Goods Subdivision, Tobacco Manufactures, Bureau Of Labor Statistics Releases Ls 53-2844 (February, 1953) And (April, 1953) For Data Through 1952; Thereafter, Monthly Labor Review.

This NBER data series m08114b appears on the NBER website in Chapter 8 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter08.html.

NBER Indicator: m08114b
